ingredients: Greek yogurt or coconut whipped cream
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F and coat two waffle pans generously with nonstick cooking spray.
In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk coconut oil, egg whites, vanilla, and maple syrup together. Add Greek yogurt, stirring until lumps disappear. Stir in vinegar and milk.
Alternate adding flour mixture and water to wet ingredients, beginning and ending with flour mixture. Stir until just incorporated (add flour in three equal parts for best results).
Divide batter between prepared pans, spreading with a spatula. Bake at 350°F for 10-13 minutes until centers feel firm and a toothpick comes out clean.
Allow waffles to cool in pan for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack.
For crispy outsides, toast cooled waffles in a toaster oven until golden brown.
Serve warm with fresh fruit, maple syrup, and Greek yogurt or coconut whipped cream.
title: Healthy Chocolate Waffles
